item.title: Report E-2024060430
item.description:
Report E-2024060430

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: RIVERVIEW
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG SPECIALTY PRODUCTS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 10150
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Specialty Products Group, LLC driver failed to secure the dome lid on the trailer. As he was navigating the shipper location to exit, approximately 50 gallons of phosphoric acid was released. Hepaco Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 10 POUNDS OF UNDECLARED DRY ICE COOLING MEAT. NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report E-2024060327
item.description:
Report E-2024060327

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-20T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-11
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING SCREENING PROCESS OF A PREBUILT UNIT (PBE) ULD AAA96907 OFFERED TO UPS AIR CARGO SERVICES IN MIAMI, FLORIDA GOING TO DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, WE DISCOVERED ONE FIBERBOARD BOX CONTAINING A LITHIUM ION BATTERY. THE PACKAGE FOUND INSIDE THE SHIPPER BUILT CONTAINER HAS A PARTIALLY REMOVED LABEL THAT RESEMBLES A BATTERY MARK. INNER PACKAGE CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALED ONE LI-ION LAWN MOWER PACKED WITH THE LITHIUM ION 21V BATTERY. DANGEROUS GOODS ARE PROHIBITED IN ALL SHIPPER PREBUILT AIR CONTAINERS.

item.description:

  • City: OCALA

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1 large box with metal frame inside for a Coleman B200R gas-powered minibike was found with a gasoline scent & torn. Upon inspection found that the minibike had between half to a full tank of gasoline. Found wet marks on tank, possible loose lid or defective tank. Outer packaging didn't display any hazmat markings.

item.title: Report E-2024060091

item.title: Report E-2024060070
item.description:
Report E-2024060070

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-17T18:16:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-31
  • City: LAKELAND
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 31, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN1760 was punctured by a nail and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from American Compliance Technologies (ACT) to remediate the impacted site. ACT personnel deployed absorbents to the impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents and the damaged container were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum to be staged onsite for future disposal.
